body_html:
When I set MAGMA_HOME and run build_pytorch.bat after running call %cd%\Miniconda3\Scripts\activate.bat %cd%\Miniconda3 from the x64 Native Tools Command Prompt for VS 2017
I get this output:
updated_build_output.txt

that ends with:

(base) C:\src\magma_cuda90\pytorch>call "C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Professional\VC\Auxiliary\Build\vcvarsall.bat" x86_amd64

** Visual Studio 2017 Developer Command Prompt v15.0.26430.14
** Copyright (c) 2017 Microsoft Corporation

[vcvarsall.bat] Environment initialized for: 'x86_x64'
aten\src\ATen\common_with_cwrap.py
1 File(s) copied
running install
running build_deps
A subdirectory or file tmp_install already exists.
A subdirectory or file build\ATen already exists.
CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:9 (project):
Running

'C:/src/magma_cuda90/pytorch/Miniconda3/Scripts/ninja.exe' '--version'

failed with:

CMake Error: CMAKE_C_COMPILER not set, after EnableLanguage
CMake Error: CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER not set, after EnableLanguage
-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
See also "C:/src/magma_cuda90/pytorch/torch/lib/build/ATen/CMakeFiles/CMakeOutput.log".
Fatal error in launcher: Unable to create process using '"'

body:
When I set `MAGMA_HOME` and run `build_pytorch.bat` after running `call %cd%\Miniconda3\Scripts\activate.bat %cd%\Miniconda3` from the `x64 Native Tools Command Prompt for VS 2017`
I get this output:
[updated_build_output.txt](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/1836434/updated_build_output.txt)

that ends with:

> (base) C:\src\magma_cuda90\pytorch>call "C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Professional\VC\Auxiliary\Build\vcvarsall.bat" x86_amd64
> **********************************************************************
> ** Visual Studio 2017 Developer Command Prompt v15.0.26430.14
> ** Copyright (c) 2017 Microsoft Corporation
> **********************************************************************
> [vcvarsall.bat] Environment initialized for: 'x86_x64'
> aten\src\ATen\common_with_cwrap.py
> 1 File(s) copied
> running install
> running build_deps
> A subdirectory or file tmp_install already exists.
> A subdirectory or file build\ATen already exists.
> CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:9 (project):
>   Running
> 
>    'C:/src/magma_cuda90/pytorch/Miniconda3/Scripts/ninja.exe' '--version'
> 
>   failed with:
> 
> CMake Error: CMAKE_C_COMPILER not set, after EnableLanguage
> CMake Error: CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER not set, after EnableLanguage
> -- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
> See also "C:/src/magma_cuda90/pytorch/torch/lib/build/ATen/CMakeFiles/CMakeOutput.log".
> Fatal error in launcher: Unable to create process using '"'
